Description.Text: The 9 muses is a traditional greek holiday estate of individual holidayunits. The resort offers a very high quality of service. Hotel Services: 18 hours front desk, bell boy service, travel desk, fax service, car rental service, 18 hour room service, wine and fruit on arrival, twice daily maid service, transfers to and from the beach / port, tickets, satelite television, excursions, in-house laundry and pressing, private dining, massage, wedding planning. Room Facilities: Mini bar/fridge, air-conditioning, mini kitchen, dial-up telephone, internet, boiler, full bathroom amenities, hairdryer, big verandas, view to the sea, safe box, Hi-Fi stereo system, room service, daily maid service, baby sitting, newspapers

The 9 muses located at Sapsila bay is one of the most private areas on the island, and the views towards the Aegean sea are breathtaking.Situated in the southeast part of Greece at the complex of islands called Dodecanesse, in the island of Patmos 3.5km from the port and southeast of the southeast of the island.
